extendedInfo.description: Gain a mastery of Italian!Italian Class contains a complete offline written Italian course, together with interactive verb, vocabulary, grammar and listening exercises. All words and phrases are available to listen to as well.Great support when you learn Italian. Easy to practice your verb conjugations, vocabulary,  grammar and phrases with.This total course covers the following content:* All tenses, with all irregular verb forms highlighted* 4000+ words, sorted into different categories such as food, transport and vacation* 40 grammar articles, covering all Italian Grammar* 200 useful phrasesAnd the following features:* Highly customizable exercises on all of the above, with a fun awards system which makes practicing fun, with separate awards for the vocabulary, verbs, grammar, listening and speaking exercises.* Keeping track of your progress by saving statistics and summaries of all done exercises, together with errors made.The first strength of this app is the extended content. No other Italian app offers this much for the same price. The other strength lies in its fun, addictive and useful exercises.The app also contains a fun speaking exercise, which should not be taken very seriously as it is now Also, although basic voices are included, it is also possible to enable additional higher quality voices from within the app, but these have to be bought first from the third party company Svox.If you are serious about learning Italian, this app is for you.IMPORTANT!We believe in a long term strategy for this app and customer feedback is very important to us. If there is something you do not like, please contact us at our developer email instead of giving us a 1 star rating. If you give us a 1 star rating, we do not even get your details so we cannot contact you back to solve the problem. If you contact us with a remark or problem and we fail to help you within a few days/weeks, depending on the severity of the problem, we understand that you give us a bad rating.Also, if your audio sounds way off, please read http://www.ceardannan.com/products/android-language-classes-text-to-speech.SOME COMPLIMENTS WE FOUND IN OUR MAILBOXYour language apps rock!! The interface is well designed, simple yet very very effective and it is as you described, very addictive.Your language apps are the best on the market. You offer far more for less.Unbelievable! I'm blown away by this app. It's almost as good as my pc version that I paid $$$ for except voice recognition could be better. Definitely worth the money.Perfect format. I like how quickly you jump on comments. Keep up the good work.PLANNED UPDATES* Writing exercises: the word, verb and grammar exercises will get a âwritingâ instead of multiple choice option, which will present the user with a textbox to type in instead of the multiple choice questions, for a bit more of a challenge.* Image exercises, such as on clock times.* Making it possible to add your own words and phrases to the app through http://www.languageshq.com.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: This app makes it very easy to practice on the go. The voice recognition and recordings are a great asset.
reviews.author: Wes Bevans

reviews.title: Best App for learning Italian
reviews.comment: I have downloaded lots od apps to learn Italian. This is the most comprehensive. It\'s a great way to learn on the go. But not a lot of variety -- I feel like I am continually asked the same few questions over and over. It is great that there are multiple levels as well.
reviews.author: Jordan L

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.comment: Excellent app! I wanted to review/practice my Italian grammar basics, but didn\'t want to have to bring my old textbooks from college everywhere, or pay lots of money for classes that would simply re-teach me what I only needed to review. This app is convenient and effective!
reviews.author: Katie Letts

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: Excellent for keeping up to speed with grammar and vocabulary
reviews.author: George Appleby

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Brilliant for testing grammar and verbs!
reviews.author: Sue Cooper

reviews.title: Benj
reviews.comment: Brilliant tool for learning Italian!
reviews.author: Benjamin Park

reviews.title: I was originally somewhat disappointed
reviews.comment: but the developer has been responsive and significantly improved the verbs/conjugations and I now think it\'s a much better product.  And, it\'s hard to find any other app that covers as many topics as this one...so I think it\'s definitely worth buying.  And, importantly, the developers seem to welcome ideas and they actually respond.
reviews.author: Stan Bozarth

reviews.title: not a class
reviews.comment: this is a series of references and exercises with no structured \"class\" content. this would be a good addition to a structured course.
reviews.author: Stephen Henderson

reviews.title: Guerda
reviews.comment: It is the best Italian class ever.  I learned a lot from it.  It is amazing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth getting
reviews.comment: Quite fun. Not an excellent source to solely learn from but has good articles on grammar, pronunciation rules etc. An excellent supplement
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost 5
reviews.comment: Amazing APP. It will teach you a lot and you will be very happy with it. Except for me it sometimes glitches and the screen freaks out and keeps going on and off if I don\'t keep the phone level and not move it around... and then I have to force close it and reopen it. Fix that and 5 stars all the way...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Italian class
reviews.comment: Would highly recommend this app. A very helpful app while learning Italian. This is the best app I have on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: eh...
reviews.comment: I expected better from an app calling itself a \"class\". The principal weakness is its reliance on multiple choice. That\'s a useless method - I always get 100% correct because one can figure it out, NOT because I knew the answer. It is also too limited in its coverage.
reviews.author: Tom Suarez

reviews.title: A Classy App
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty good. If only it included dip/tripthong explanations then it would\'ve got 5stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I wish school was this much fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Instructive
reviews.comment: The navigation is very clear. A very language tutorial good app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Great app for the price, love it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good teacher
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung s2
reviews.comment: Voice not clear
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: A Google User
